answers.answer: Hi there.  Carpal tunnel syndrome can explain the symptoms on your wrist but does not explain the ankle symptoms.  You may be having a systemic condition such as some form of arthritis (rheumatoid) that has not fully manifested itself.  Neuropathy may also explain your symptoms and this is mostly due to stress or nutritional deficiency.  Other B vitamins should be supplemented aside from the B12 (B1, B6).  I suggest that you discuss with your doctors about tests to the nerves such as NCV (nerve conduction velocity) to assess for neuropathy.
